subject: Pedals not working anymore
description_text:

Sind beim Fahren ausgefallen. Ein Video ist zu groß um es Ihnen zu senden.

Hi Ricoo Leone,  Please use a toothpick or screwdriver to press and hold the small button inside the hole on the side of the control box, then reconnect the USB cable. The software should enter recovery mode. Next, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → Firmware → Pedals → plusX.sfu and try updating the firmware manually. If the issue persists, we recommend installing Todesk (no registration required). Simply provide your ID and temporary access code, and we can schedule a time to assist you remotely.

Hey guys, thank you for answer me. I do it right now with a screwdriver and hold it for 10seconds. And reconnected the USB but the problem is already there. I have the latest driver installed. Hi Ricoo Leone,     Keep holding down the upgrade button and then re-insert the USB cable. Once Simsonn Manager indicates that it has entered firmware upgrade mode, you can release the button and follow the steps in the software to complete the recovery process.  If this does not solve the issue, please let me know your city and local time, and we can schedule a remote session so I can assist you directly.
